trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs object is passed to any handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs 物件傳遞至任何處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A> property contains the data that will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A>屬性包含將一併刪除的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before it deletes the data, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A> property contains an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前先刪除的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException>執行個體</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>的資料物件，表示資料來源擲回驗證例外狀況

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取到的所有驗證例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no validation exception is thrown, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A> property contains `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有驗證擲回例外狀況，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性包含`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您處理驗證例外狀況，而且不想要重新擲回的例外狀況，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: You create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event to validate the data, to examine validation errors from the data class, or to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 您建立的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>事件，以驗證資料，以檢查驗證錯誤，從 資料類別，或取消刪除作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: You cancel the delete operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您藉由設定取消刪除作業<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control stores the original values from the data source in view state in the Web page, except those whose <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute> attribute is marked as `UpdateCheck.Never`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>原始值的資料來源檢視中的控制存放區狀態在網頁上，除了其<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute>屬性標示為`UpdateCheck.Never`。</xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: LINQ to SQL automatically checks the integrity of the data before deleting the data.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to SQL 會自動檢查資料的完整性，然後再刪除資料。

trans-unit.source: It does this by comparing the current values in the data source with the original values that are stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 它會藉由比較資料來源中的目前值與儲存在檢視狀態中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: You can perform additional data validation by creating a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行額外的資料驗證所建立的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: An object of the type specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*> property that contains the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: 在指定之類型的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>屬性，其中包含要刪除的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"></xref>類別具有指定的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred when validating the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: 驗證要刪除的資料時所發生的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得擲回例外狀況時刪除作業之前驗證資料。

trans-unit.source: If a validation exception is thrown before the delete operation is performed, the exception is stored in the Exception property.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行刪除作業之前，會擲回驗證例外狀況，例外狀況會儲存在例外狀況屬性。

trans-unit.source: In an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event, you can retrieve the exception through the Exception property.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>事件，您可以擷取透過屬性將例外狀況的例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生錯誤。 例外狀況否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指出是否已處理的例外狀況，而且，它應該不會擲回一次。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event to examine validation exceptions that were thrown before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>事件，以檢查刪除作業之前所擲回驗證例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the ExceptionHandled property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您處理的例外狀況，而不想要再次擲回，ExceptionHandled 屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the ExceptionHandled property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定 ExceptionHandled 屬性`true`，例外狀況會傳播至呼叫堆疊中下一個事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理的例外狀況。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，代表要刪除的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use the OriginalObject property to interact with the data before it is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 OriginalObject 屬性於刪除之前，與資料互動。

trans-unit.source: You can validate the data, or you can cancel the event by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證資料，或您可以藉由設定取消事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify which record is deleted by changing the value or values of the object in the OriginalObject property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改哪些記錄會被刪除，藉由變更 OriginalObject 屬性中之物件的值。

trans-unit.source: An object of the type specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*> property that contains the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: 在指定之類型的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>屬性，其中包含要刪除的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>
